alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 12 at 11:02PM CDT until April 12 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Mower County in southeastern Minnesota... Northwestern Fillmore County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Grand Meadow, or 21 miles east of Austin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. Damage caused by a possible tornado has been reported by Taopi. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Spring Valley around 1115 PM CDT. Wykoff around 1125 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Highways 63 And 16, Hamilton, County Roads 4 And 3, Ostrander, Fillmore, County Roads 4 And 8 and Washington. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
